content:
What a great idea! Catching a Premier League game live in London will be an amazing experience!

According to the Premier League schedule, Manchester City has one away game in London this month:

* Saturday, November 27: Manchester City vs. West Ham United (10:00 AM ET) - London Stadium (Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, London)

This match is scheduled to take place at the London Stadium, which is the home of West Ham United. If you're planning to attend this game, make sure to book your tickets in advance, as they tend to sell out quickly.

If you're not able to get tickets for this match or prefer to watch Manchester City play at a different stadium, you can explore other options. There are several other Premier League teams in London, such as Chelsea, Arsenal, Tottenham Hotspur, and Crystal Palace, who might have home games during your trip.

Keep in mind that Premier League schedules are subject to change, so it's essential to double-check the fixture dates and times before booking your trip.

Have a fantastic time in London, and I hope you enjoy the match!
